p: Territory of Washington} County of Chehalis}ss

Maria Kristina Peterson being duly sworn says that she is the petitioner named in the foregoing petition, that she has heard the same read, knows the contents thereof and that the same is true as she verily believes
Subscribed & Sworn to before me this 17th day of Sept. 1888
Application of Maria Kristina Peterson for writs of Habeas Corpus
